Title: Relates to unfair claim settlement practices; provides civil remedies
Summary: Relates to unfair claim settlement practices; provides that plaintiff may recover interest, costs and disbursements; compensatory damages, consequential damages and reasonable attorneys' fees in addition to amounts due under the policy when the insurer refused to pay or unreasonable delay of payment was not reasonably justified.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to unfair claim settlement practices
